remarks: Define the modular pair relation (on the Hilbert lattice).  Definition 1.1 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 1, who use the notation (x,y)M for "the ordered pair <x,y> is a modular pair."  See ~ mdbr for membership relation. (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2004.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
df-md $p |- MH = { <. x , y >. | ( ( x e. CH /\ y e. CH ) /\ A. z e. CH ( z C_ y -> ( ( z vH x ) i^i y ) = ( z vH ( x i^i y ) ) ) ) } $.
$d x y z $.
